channel.title: PLZZZ HELP Making npc's reply in text and being able to talk back
channel.description:
Yeah um anyone know how to make it where when you click talk on an npc they start talking to you and then you make it where you can say something back ect.....
And also how to make it where npc's tele you somewhere after they get done talking??? PLZZZZ HELP

item.title: PLZZZ HELP Making npc's reply in text and being able to talk back
item.dc:creator: @R4nge R4nge
item.description:
@R4nge wrote:

Just anything for anything so I dont have to make it spawn over there heads and lag the sever plus it looks bad.

Example:
Any of the Npcs in real rs when you click talk there little text screen opens and they say like hello or w/e and then your given an option on what to say back

Read full topic
